channel.title: Gulp on SoByte

item.title: Gulp for front-end automated builds
item.description: The core of this post is an introduction to Gulp, a powerful taskflow tool. The reason why it is titled “Gulp for front-end automated builds” is that Gulp itself is an npm package written in JS that runs in a Node environment, and most developers also use it as an automated front-end project build tool for front-end projects. However, essentially, Gulp is not just for front-end build automation, but also
